body: The Persona 5 Doujinshi selections makes me sad for the most part. This included.

@Austin0404 finally someone who gets it. People like to shit on NTR so often but more than half the NTR doujins on this site are generic blackmail/drug and rape garbage. Though if I were to say, I think its exactly because the relationships in Persona 5 being non-canon makes authors do these kinds of works, gives it a more personal feeling I suppose since Joker is meant to be the players self-insert to begin with.
NEW GORGONZOLA DOUJIN LETSGOOOOOOOOO but why did it have to be fatsona? =/
Art was nice, stry I don't care much for (I can't read it). Overall, it's great.
The irony is Joker have more harem hentai of his in this site than the NTRed one.
And also the use of condoms ruined it ffs
We were so close to greatness.... Damn NTR.
Being a hoe but she have that nice slim body with a bubble butt not gonna lie
Excellent, although I wish gorgonzola would take it easy with the anteater blowjob faces sometimes lol. Not nearly enough Sumire doujins out there.
Exactly why I don't play or associate with any anime or games with waifus. I feel nothing while reading NTR of them lol. Time to enjoy the artstyle!

What goes on in people's heads when they make shit like this...
I don't even particularly hate NTR, but what I do hate is when the story is so bad its just not even worth existing. I know its purely some weird fantasy idea the creator had considering no relationship in persona 5 is even canon but still how can you have a cheating story involving a PHANTOM THEIF! The idea is so fucking bad that it just doesn't work.  Although I suppose if you're just looking for ntr to fap to and have no idea what persona even is (the game this is based off of) then you definitely don't care but as a fan of the game myself this just bothers me lmao
